title: Luis Suárez scores as Lionel Messi's Inter Miami secures a 2-1 victory over Atlético Nacional in Germán Berterame’s debut match
desc: Inter Miami claimed a dramatic 2-1 friendly win over Atlético Nacional in Medellín, with Luis Suárez on the scoresheet and Germán Berterame making his first appearance for the club. Lionel Messi played 76 minutes, while a late own goal sealed Miami’s first preseason victory after a tough loss in Peru.
